name: The Collector V2.0
description:
Game downloads in a .zip file

Please leave some feedback good or bad i want to improve my games.  Comment any bugs if u find some.

This is my first game made with Unity and my first game uploaded to itch.io so if the download doesn't work leave a comment ill try to fix it( I made this in unity so it downloads in a unity file).  I will continue to update this game if u have any thing to add that you think that would improve the game leave them in the comments and ill try my best to add them.
